${ModID}:SelloutQuest.TITLE: Sellout
${ModID}:SelloutQuest.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, add #b3 #yAdvertisements to your deck. Remove #b1 #yAdvertisement from your deck every #b5 combats won. Remove ALL #yAdvertisements from your deck to complete the quest.
${ModID}:SelloutQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.TITLE: Ceaseless Hunger
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, obtain #yN'loth's #yFace [REMOVE_SPACE]. Obtain another #yN'loth's #yFace at the start of Act 2. Open a chest in Act 3 to complete this Quest.
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.REWARD: Remove all #yN'loth's #yFaces and obtain #b2 random #yRelics for each #yN'loth's #yFace removed.
